alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 4:28PM CDT until May 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TIPTON AND LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ft Pillow, or near Fort Pillow State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Covington, Ripley, Fort Pillow State Park, Ashport, Ft Pillow, Henning, Garland, Edith, Dryhill, Orysa, Bride, Durhamville, Golddust, Luckett, Three Point, Flippin, Opossum, Lightfoot, Glimp and Arp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
